decks.notes: This Jeskai Control deck focuses on controlling the game through counterspells, removal spells, and card draw. It aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while steadily building card advantage and setting up for powerful late-game threats like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury. The deck includes a mix of versatile removal options like Wrath of the Skies and Consign to Memory, along with efficient counterspells like Counterspell. By using these tools to control the game and manage threats, the deck aims to outvalue the opponent and secure victory in the late game.

The deck focuses on quickly developing a board presence with a mix of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells, aiming to control the game and disrupt the opponent's plans. By combining creatures that provide value when they enter or leave the battlefield with cards that interact with the opponent's board, the deck seeks to outmaneuver the opponent and overwhelm them with a combination of aggression and disruption. The deck also utilizes Aether Vial to cheat creatures into play at instant speed, further increasing its ability to control the flow of the game.

The deck focuses on using disruptive creatures and removal spells to control the board while quickly putting pressure on the opponent. By utilizing cards like Aether Vial and Ephemerate, it can efficiently deploy threat after threat, overwhelming the opponent. The creatures in the deck also have abilities that can disrupt the opponent's strategy, such as exiling key cards or bouncing creatures. Overall, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while aggressively advancing its own board presence to secure victory.

The main concept of this deck revolves around assembling the UrzaTron lands (Urza's Mine, Urza's Power Plant, and Urza's Tower) to generate a large amount of mana quickly. This mana is then used to cast powerful spells and abilities to control the game and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck also utilizes cards like Karn, the Great Creator and Thought-Knot Seer to further disrupt the opponent and maintain control of the game. Additionally, cards like All Is Dust and Sowing Mycospawn help to clear the board and create advantageous positions for the player.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on aggressive creature strategies, with a mix of powerful creatures like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer. The deck also includes burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Galvanic Discharge to quickly finish off opponents. Additionally, it includes cards like Arena of Glory and Thraben Charm to support its creatures and provide additional value. The deck aims to pressure opponents early and maintain a strong board presence to quickly close out games.

This Modern 1 vs 1 deck revolves around utilizing Emry, Lurker of the Loch, Grinding Station, and Underworld Breach to enable a powerful combo sequence. By recurring artifacts and spells with Emry and Breach, the deck aims to generate card advantage and control the board with Malevolent Rumble and other disruption spells. The deck also incorporates various mana accelerants such as Mox Opal and Mox Amber to quickly ramp into its combo pieces. Overall, the strategy focuses on building a synergistic engine to overwhelm opponents and secure victory.

The deck focuses on using ramp cards like Utopia Sprawl and Eldrazi Temple to quickly cast powerful Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul, the Promised End and World Breaker. It also utilizes control elements such as Kozilek's Command and Malevolent Rumble to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with massive Eldrazi threats while controlling the board and disrupting their strategy. Karn, the Great Creator also provides additional utility and flexibility in dealing with various threats or situations. Ultimately, the deck aims to outvalue and outmaneuver the opponent to secure victory.

The main concept of this Mono Black Control deck is to disrupt the opponent's game plan with hand disruption spells like Inquisition of Kozilek and Thoughtseize, while also removing threats with cards like Fatal Push and Kozilek's Command. The deck also utilizes graveyard interaction with cards like Cling to Dust and Graveyard Trespasser, and has a strong win condition in Emperor of Bones. The deck also has land destruction elements with Field of Ruin and Demolition Field to further disrupt the opponent's mana base. Overall, the deck focuses on control elements to outlast and outvalue the opponent.

The deck focuses on using ramp spells like Utopia Sprawl and Eldrazi Temple to quickly play powerful Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul, the Promised End and World Breaker. Control elements are included with cards like Ugin's Labyrinth and Malevolent Rumble to disrupt the opponent's game plan. Karn, the Great Creator can search for key artifacts like Kozilek's Return to further control the battlefield. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with massive creatures while controlling the board to secure victory.

This deck focuses on quickly reanimating powerful creatures from the graveyard, using cards like Goryo's Vengeance and Consign to Memory. It also includes disruption tools like Thoughseize and Fatal Push to control the game while setting up the combo. The goal is to cheat out creatures like Griselbrand or Emperor of Bones for a game-winning advantage. Psychic Frog and Picklock Prankster provide additional utility and card advantage while Tainted Indulgence and Sink into Stupor disrupt opponents' plans. A flexible and fast-paced strategy that aims to overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats.

The key concept of this deck is to disrupt and control your opponent's game plan through a combination of counter spells, removal, and disruptive creatures. By utilizing cards like Counterspell, Fatal Push, and Force of Negation, you aim to prevent your opponent from developing their board while also deploying threats of your own like Murktide Regent and Abhorrent Oculus. The inclusion of cards like Thought Scour and Unearth also allow you to dig through your deck and recur key creatures, ensuring you maintain the upper hand in the match.

This deck focuses on aggressively controlling the board with powerful creatures and disruptive spells, while also gaining incremental advantage through card selection and removal. The cards in the deck are carefully selected to provide strong synergy and ensure that the Orzhov Midrange strategy is executed efficiently. The deck aims to apply pressure early in the game and maintain a strong presence on the battlefield, while disrupting the opponent's game plan with discard and removal spells.
